name: A Boi And Their Bat
description:
Short prototype made in Game Maker Studio 1.4 within 2 days for DevAtlas Jam 2 (4 levels) following the theme "One light source"

Explore the dark dungeons with your trusty lamp-carrying bat.

Avoid the many traps while trying to find Oil to refill the lamp, food to heal, guns to fight back the nasty monsters, and last but not least the exit to the next level!

On an Xbox 360-compatible Joypad, the right analog stick controls the bat. The game is also playable with keyboard, but I wouldn't recommend tackling the game like that alone (letting a second player take control of the bat works though).
